org.jclouds.azure.management.features

Interface OSImageApi


  • public interface OSImageApi
    The Service Management API includes operations for managing the OS images in your subscription.
    Author:
    Gerald Pereira, Adrian Cole
    See Also:
    docs, OSImageAsyncApi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(OSImageParams params)
      The Add OS Image operation adds an OS image that is currently stored in a storage account in your subscription to the image repository.
      void delete(String imageName)
      The Delete Hosted Service operation deletes the specified hosted service from Windows Azure.
      Set<OSImage> list()
      The List Hosted Services operation lists the hosted services available under the current subscription.
      void update(OSImageParams params)
      The Update OS Image operation updates an OS image that in your image repository.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        Set<OSImage> list()
        The List Hosted Services operation lists the hosted services available under the current subscription.
        Returns:
        the response object

      • add

        void add(OSImageParams params)
        The Add OS Image operation adds an OS image that is currently stored in a storage account in your subscription to the image repository.
        Parameters:
        params - the required parameters needed to add an image

      • update

        void update(OSImageParams params)
        The Update OS Image operation updates an OS image that in your image repository.
        Parameters:
        params - the required parameters needed to update an image

      • delete

        void delete(String imageName)
        The Delete Hosted Service operation deletes the specified hosted service from Windows Azure.
        Parameters:
        imageName - the unique DNS Prefix value in the Windows Azure Management Portal
